001package fr.univavignon.pokedex.api;
002
003import java.util.Comparator;
004
005/**
006 * Enumeration of pokemon comparator.
007 * 
008 * @author fv
009 */
010public enum PokemonComparators implements Comparator<Pokemon> {
011
012        /** Comparator using Pokemon name. **/
013        NAME(Comparator.comparing(Pokemon::getName)),
014
015        /** Comparator using Pokemon index. **/
016        INDEX(Comparator.comparing(Pokemon::getIndex)),
017        
018        /** Comparator using Pokemon combat point. **/
019        CP(Comparator.comparing(Pokemon::getCp));
020        
021        /** Delegate comparator instance. **/
022        private final Comparator<Pokemon> delegate;
023
024        /**
025         * Default constructor.
026         * 
027         * @param delegate Delegate comparator instance.
028         */
029        PokemonComparators(final Comparator<Pokemon> delegate) {
030                this.delegate = delegate;
031        }
032
033        /** {@inheritDoc} **/
034        @Override
035        public int compare(final Pokemon first, final Pokemon second) {
036                
037                return delegate.compare(first, second);
038        }
039
040}
